name: Itellmyhusbandthenews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Shannon Green, a journalist at USA TODAY, tells her husband Dusty Terrill, a local comedian, the news stories of the week that he most likely missed in this weekly podcast. Listen to this podcast if you're looking for a laugh and to learn something new.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
